pageProduct.name: Swisse Ultiboost Joint Repair 90 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Ultiboost Joint Repair is a premium quality multi-nutrient formula to help reduce cartilage damage and relieve symptoms of mild osteoarthritis of the knee.

Cartilage Health: Glucosamine helps reduce damage to cartilage - the connective tissue that cushions joints and supports joint cartilage health.

Connective Tissue: Manganese assists connective tissue formation, helps maintain bone health and reduces free radical damage to body cells.

Mild Osteoarthritis Symptom Relief: Glucosamine sulfate helps relieve mild joint pain and inflammation associated with osteoarthritis of the knee.

Joint Health & Mobility: Glucosamine sulfate helps support joint health, mobility and flexibility by relieving mild joint stiffness.

Clinically Tested Glucosamine Sulfate: Clinical trials demonstrate positive results for the symptomatic relief of mild osteoarthritis with glucosamine sulfate.

Size: 90 Tablets

Warnings

If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Derived from seafood. The recommended daily dose of this medicine contains 233 mg of sodium.

Ingredients

EACH TABLET CONTAINS:GLUCOSAMINE SULFATE (from glucosamine sulfate sodium chloride), BOVINE SODIUM CHONDROITIN SULFATE, MANGANESE (from manganese sulfate monohydrate).

GLUCOSAMINE SULFATE (from glucosamine sulfate-sodium chloride complex 942.92 mg) 750 mg

CHONDROITIN SULFATE - BOVINE SODIUM 400 mg

MANGANESE (from manganese sulfate monohydrate 2.15 mg) 700 mcg

Directions

ADULT DOSAGE: Two tablets daily, during or immediately after a meal, or as directed by a healthcare professional.

Two tablets daily, during or immediately after a meal, or as directed by a healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry place. Do not use if cap seal is broken.
